title: 142: The Amazon/Whole Foods Revolution
itunes:title: 142: The Amazon/Whole Foods Revolution
itunes:subtitle: Whole Foods founder and CEO John Mackey on the future of supermarkets; Dawson City, Yukon, Canada's "Sour Toe Cocktail"; our recipe for Vietnamese Coffee Cake; salt and pepper get divorced; and Dr. Aaron Carroll on why eggs are safe.
description:
Whole Foods founder and CEO John Mackey on the future of supermarkets; Dawson City, Yukon, Canada’s “Sour Toe Cocktail”; our recipe for Vietnamese Coffee Cake; salt and pepper get divorced; and Dr. Aaron Carroll on why eggs are safe.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
